meanings.definition: Move with a smooth wavelike motion.
meanings.sent1: The flag undulated gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: The snake undulated through the grass silently.
meanings.sent3: The undulating dance of the flames mesmerized the audience.
meanings.sent4: The undulated road ahead seemed to mimic the ocean waves.
meanings.sent5: The undulating hills rolled like a green ocean under the sky.

meanings.definition: Have a wavy form or outline.
meanings.sent1: Her hair undulated in beautiful curls down her back.
meanings.sent2: The sand dunes undulated gracefully along the horizon.
meanings.sent3: The undulating river snaked its way through the valley.
meanings.sent4: The undulated pattern on the fabric resembled ocean waves.
meanings.sent5: The undulating clouds painted the sky with their soft curves.
